project_structure.README.md:
# Focus on Fitness Website

A modern, responsive website for Focus on Fitness - a premium gym setup and fitness equipment provider.

## Features

- üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Modern fitness-focused design
- üì± Fully responsive layout
- ‚ö° Built with Next.js 14 and TypeScript
- üé® Styled with Tailwind CSS
- üî• Smooth animations and transitions
- üìû Contact form functionality
- üéØ SEO optimized

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Node.js 18.0 or later
- npm or yarn

### Installation

1. Clone the repository:
```bash
git clone <your-repo-url>
cd focus-on-fitness
```

2. Install dependencies:
```bash
npm install
# or
yarn install
```

3. Run the development server:
```bash
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
```

4. Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) with your browser to see the result.

## Project Structure

```
src/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ globals.css
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ layout.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ page.tsx
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ components/
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ FocusFitnessWebsite.tsx
```

## Built With

- [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) - React framework
- [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) - Type safety
- [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) - Styling
- [Lucide React](https://lucide.dev/) - Icons

## Deployment

The easiest way to deploy your Next.js app is to use the [Vercel Platform](https://vercel.com/new?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=next-example) from the creators of Next.js.

Check out our [Next.js deployment documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs/deployment) for more details.

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License.

setup_instructions: 1. Create a new directory for your project: mkdir focus-on-fitness && cd focus-on-fitness
3. Install Next.js and dependencies: npm install next@14.0.0 react@^18.2.0 react-dom@^18.2.0 lucide-react@^0.263.1
4. Install dev dependencies: npm install -D typescript @types/node @types/react @types/react-dom tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer eslint eslint-config-next
5. Initialize Tailwind CSS: npx tailwindcss init -p
6. Create the folder structure: mkdir -p src/app src/components
7. Copy all the configuration files from the structure above
8. Copy your existing TSX component code into src/components/FocusFitnessWebsite.tsx
9. Run the development server: npm run dev
